title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 
(Minimum Conditions for Examining of Vegetable Species) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (minimum condition examining vegetable species) (amendment) regulation 2020

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 2. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of 
Vegetable Species) Regulations 2004 (S.I. No. 121 of 2004) are amended by 
substituting in Regulation 2 for the definition of “Directive” (as amended by 
European Communities (Minimum Conditions for examining of Vegetable 
Species) (Amendment) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 305 of 2019) the following- 

“‘Directive’ means Commission Directive No. 2003/91/EC of 6 
October 20032 as amended by Commission Implementing Directive 
(EU) 2019/1985 of 28 November 2019;”.
text_norm: 2 european community (minimum condition examining vegetable species) regulation 2004 (s.i no 121 2004) amended substituting regulation 2 definition directive (as amended european community (minimum condition examining vegetable species) (amendment) regulation 2019 (s.i no 305 2019) following- directive mean commission directive no 2003 91 ec 6 october 20032 amended commission implementing directive (eu) 2019 1985 28 november 2019

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 3. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of
text_raw:
3. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining of 
Vegetable Species) (Amendment) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 305 of 2019) are 
revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 February, 2020. 

MICHAEL CREED, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

1 O.J. No. L308, 29.11.2019, p.86 

2 O.J. No. L254, 08.10.2003, p. 11 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st February, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [49] 3

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2019/1985 of 29 November 2019 which amends Council 
Directive 2003/91/EC on the Characteristics and Minimum Conditions for 
Examining of Vegetable Species. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [49]
